content: these crochet baskets are quick fun and practical made with super bulky yarn they work up fast and hold their shape beautifully the pattern includes two sizes a smaller basket without handles and a slightly larger one with handles they re perfect for organizing your space storing yarn or adding a cozy handmade touch to your home you can easily adjust the height or width to suit your needs whether for storage or decor these baskets are as functional as they are cute more details and the free pattern https //mycrochetspace com/crochet-basket-pattern/
